item.title: 面对迫在眉睫的人工智能动荡，广告业狂欢戛纳
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Benoit Berthelot 报道说，在法国一年一度的戛纳国际广告节上，尽管人们对人工智能即将带来的影响深感焦虑，但广告业仍像往常一样狂欢。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Benoit Berthelot reports that the ad industry continues to party as usual at the annual Cannes Lions festival in France despite underlying anxiety about the coming effects of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 前 SpaceX 员工为国防制造初创公司筹集资金
item.description:
Senra系统公司加入了旨在加速美国无人机、火箭等产品制造的初创公司行列。【原文：

Senra Systems joins a growing list of startups aiming to accelerate American manufacturing of drones, rockets and more.

】

item.title: 美联储思考关税打击是否比预期的要小，或者只是晚一些
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们将关注即将召开的美联储政策会议。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston and today we’re looking at the upcoming Fed policy meeting. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普利用关税工具包打击消费品
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的普遍关税可能会在最高法院摊牌，他的政府正在加紧实施另一项战略，该战略可能会打击同样广泛的进口产品。【原文：With President Donald Trump’s universal tariffs possibly headed for a Supreme Court showdown, his administration is pressing ahead with another strategy that could hit an equally broad swath of imports.】

item.title: 特朗普对美元 "玩火 "威胁进一步下跌
item.description:
今年，该货币对一些同类货币的汇率下跌了 10%

。【原文：

The currency is down 10% this year against some of its peers

】

item.title: 美联储鸽派风险抵消油价提振，美元下跌
item.description: 美联储鸽派会议的前景与油价上涨相互竞争，推动和拉动美元交易员朝不同的方向发展。【原文：The prospect of a dovish Federal Reserve meeting is competing with higher oil prices to push and pull dollar traders in diverging directions.】

item.title: 实验室培育的肉类获批后不久将出现在澳大利亚的菜单上
item.description: 澳大利亚批准销售免屠宰的日本鹌鹑，成为世界上第三个允许销售由动物细胞培育的肉类的国家。【原文：Australia has approved the sale of slaughter-free Japanese quail, becoming only the third country in the world to permit the sale of meat cultivated from animal cells.】

item.title: 挪威在首次降息前将继续等待
item.description: 挪威央行准备坚持发达经济体中最鹰派的政策立场之一，在今年晚些时候之前暂不启动大流行后的宽松政策。【原文：Norway’s central bank is poised to stick with one of the most hawkish policy stances among advanced economies, holding off on any start to post-pandemic easing until later this year.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油流量下降抑制油价反弹收益
item.description:
截至6月15日的四周内，原油发货量降至4月份以来的最低点

。【原文：

Crude shipments fell to the lowest since April in the four weeks to June 15

】

item.title: 巴西经济学家呼声高低不一，预示着利率决定将惊心动魄
item.description: 在本周巴西利率决议前夕，XP 首席经济学家 Caio Megale 对数据和政策制定者的讲话苦苦思索，最终将他的预测从上调四分之一个点改为按兵不动。ASA 经济学家莱昂纳多-科斯塔（Leonardo Costa）在仔细研究了同样的细节后，做出了相反的选择，他放弃了对稳定借贷成本的押注，转而呼吁加息。【原文：On the eve of Brazil’s interest rate decision this week, XP’s Chief Economist Caio Megale agonized over data and policymaker speeches before switching his forecast to a hold from a quarter-point rise. Poring over the same details, ASA economist Leonardo Costa went the opposite way, ditching his bet on steady borrowing costs and calling for a hike instead.】

item.title: 以色列袭击导致货物清仓，伊朗石油出口激增
item.description: 据一家专门监测秘密航运的公司称，自上周五伊朗遭到以色列袭击以来，伊朗的石油出口量猛增。【原文：Iran’s oil exports have jumped since the nation came under attack from Israel on Friday, according to a firm that specializes in monitoring clandestine shipping.】

item.title: Blackstone 看好 2,000 亿美元的潜在欧洲信贷交易
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 认为未来 10 年欧洲信贷将有 2,000 亿美元的投资机会，这凸显了该地区对寻求美国以外投资机会的投资者的吸引力。【原文：Blackstone Inc. sees a $200 billion investment opportunity in European credit over the next 10 years, underscoring the region’s appeal to investors looking for alternatives to the US.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴支持的 "人工智能龙 "MiniMax 据称计划在香港上市
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士称，MiniMax 正在考虑在香港进行首次公开募股，这对一家估值约 30 亿美元的中国人工智能初创企业来说，将是一次具有里程碑意义的行业首秀。【原文：MiniMax is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, people familiar with the situation said, in what would be a landmark industry debut for a Chinese AI startup valued at about $3 billion.】

item.title: 花旗银行曼特希称英国股票是最受欢迎的地缘政治对冲工具
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的策略师说，英国股市可以为投资者提供最好的保护，防止地缘政治紧张局势升级，因为英国股市对能源公司和传统防御性股票的风险敞口很高。【原文：The UK stock market could offer investors the best protection against an escalation in geopolitical tensions, Citigroup Inc. strategists say, given its high exposure to energy firms and traditional defensive shares.】

item.title: 针对关税的盈利调整引起对 Urbaser 债务出售的关注
item.description: 美国的贸易战促使一家公司使用一种财务指标，这种指标因掩盖了关税的实际情况而招致专家的批评。【原文：The US trade war has prompted one company to use a financial metric that’s drawing criticism from experts for obscuring the reality of tariffs.】

item.title: 以色列称最早可能于周四恢复向埃及出口天然气
item.description: 以色列能源部长伊莱-科恩（Eli Cohen）表示，以色列可能最早于周四恢复对埃及的天然气供应，从而有可能缓解北非国家的部分压力。【原文：Israel may resume natural gas supplies to Egypt as early as Thursday, Energy Minister Eli Cohen said, potentially easing some of the stress on the North African country.】

item.title: 华尔街担心鹰派美联储将引发股市大跌
item.description: 尽管中东战争、贸易紧张局势、经济增长放缓等风险层出不穷，但这些天股市似乎并没有受到什么影响。但华尔街最大的恐惧将在今天到来，届时美联储会议结束，主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔将解释央行的前景。【原文：Not much seems to faze the stock market these days even as risks abound, from war in the Middle East, to trade tensions, to slowing growth. But Wall Street’s biggest fear arrives today when the Federal Reserve meeting ends and Chair Jerome Powell explains the central bank’s outlook.】

item.title: 淡马锡寻求与印尼达纳塔拉财富基金合作
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）表示，欢迎有机会与印尼新成立的主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）合作。【原文：Singaporean state-owned investor Temasek Holdings Pte said it welcomes the chance to work with Indonesia’s newly-formed sovereign wealth fund Danantara.】

item.title: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA）主席称萨瓦德尔出售 TSB 的 "时机未到
item.description: BBVA SA 主席卡洛斯-托雷斯（Carlos Torres）批评了萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）决定探索出售其英国分部的时机，同时坚称此举不会破坏他对这家西班牙竞争对手的竞购。【原文：BBVA SA Chairman Carlos Torres criticized the timing of Banco Sabadell SA’s decision to explore a sale of its UK unit, while insisting such a move wouldn’t derail his bid for the Spanish rival.】

item.title: 战争风险导致波斯湾以外地区的石油需求飙升
item.description: 由于以色列与伊朗的冲突有可能危及船只通过霍尔木兹海峡，在波斯湾外装载的中东石油和至少一种马来西亚等级的石油突然受到亚洲买家的青睐。【原文：Middle Eastern oil that loads outside the Persian Gulf and at least one Malaysian grade are suddenly more popular with Asian buyers as the Israel-Iran conflict threatens to imperil the passage of vessels through the Strait of Hormuz.】

item.title: 美国拥有比中国更多的铜，但无法提炼所有铜
item.description:
该行业需要克服高昂的能源和劳动力成本、环保法规以及过剩的中国廉价竞争，才能使美国铜冶炼业再度辉煌。【原文：

The industry will need to overcome high energy and labor costs, environmental regulations and a glut of cheap Chinese competition to make US copper smelting great again.

】

item.title: Netflix 新增法国 TF1 电视频道的电视直播和体育节目
item.description: Netflix Inc. 将增加法国广播公司 TF1 的直播电视频道和节目，扩大流媒体平台为该国用户提供的直播服务。【原文：Netflix Inc. will add live television channels and shows from French broadcaster TF1, expanding the streaming platform’s live offer for customers in the country.】

item.title: 耶伦和伯南克反对美国共和党支持削减金融研究经费
item.description: 前美联储主席珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）和本-伯南克（Ben Bernanke）以及其他一些学者、市场参与者和前财政部官员敦促国会领导层反对削减负责收集数据以防止另一场金融危机的办公室。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Chairs Janet Yellen and Ben Bernanke, along with several other academics, market participants and former Treasury officials, urged congressional leadership to oppose cuts to an office charged with gathering data aimed at preventing another financial crisis.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行行长称比索干预 "徒劳无益
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，干预货币市场以支撑比索是徒劳的，比索本月已下跌约 2%。【原文：Philippine central bank Governor Eli Remolona said it’s futile to intervene in the currency market to support the peso, which has fallen about 2% this month.】

item.title: 中国抨击七国集团和冯德莱恩对其政策的批评
item.description: 中国抨击七国集团干涉中国内政，并斥责一位欧洲高级官员批评中国政府的稀土和经济政策。【原文：China has attacked the Group of Seven nations for what it called interference in its internal affairs and chastised a top European official for criticizing Beijing’s rare earth and economic policies.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩改革停滞不前，债券涨幅超过 200
item.description: 新兴市场债券投资者去年最赚钱的赌注，如今却让他们蒙受了两位数的损失；黎巴嫩银行业改革停滞不前，主权债务一落千丈。【原文：Emerging-market bond investors’ most profitable bet of the past year is now handing them double-digit losses — as Lebanon’s stalled banking reforms sink its sovereign debt.】

item.title: 以色列谢克尔的平静受到威胁，各种选择预示着动荡
item.description: 期权交易员们正准备迎接以色列谢克尔自 2023 年加沙战争爆发以来的任何一次剧烈波动；这是对冲以色列谢克尔迄今为止在国家多重冲突中表现出的韧性崩溃的一种手段。【原文：Options traders are bracing for the Israeli shekel to experience wilder moves than at any time since the start of the Gaza war in 2023 — a hedge against any breakdown in the resilience it’s so far shown against the nation’s multiple ongoing conflicts.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔称经济前景面临 "实质性 "风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，欧元区的经济前景面临着 "巨大的 "危险，官员们正在努力评估这些危险。【原文：The euro-zone’s economic prospects face “substantial” dangers that officials are struggling to assess, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.】

item.title: 瑞银确认外部供应商遭网络攻击后数据被盗
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，该公司一家供应商的信息在一次网络攻击中被盗。此前，瑞士一家报纸报道称，该公司 130,000 多名员工的数据遭到黑客攻击。【原文：UBS Group AG said that information about the company had been stolen in a cyber attack on one of its suppliers, following a report a Swiss newspaper that data on more than 130,000 employees had been subject to a hack.】

item.title: 汇丰银行任命 Chua 为管理与市场营销部主管，将业务拓展至亚洲和中东地区
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）任命Christopher Chua为并购业务主管，该银行在进行全面改革后将目标锁定在亚洲和中东地区。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has appointed Christopher Chua as head of mergers and acquisitions as the lender targets growth in Asia and the Middle East after a sweeping revamp.】
